rationale: This config balances exploration and exploitation by slightly increasing the learning rate and batch size while keeping other parameters near optimal values.

This config focuses on high-correlation parameters by increasing the learning rate, decreasing the batch size, and adjusting the gamma value to potentially explore better regions of the hyperparameter space.
This config aims to exploit the best-performing regions by slightly decreasing the learning rate and increasing the batch size while keeping other parameters close to their current values.
